org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.monitoring

Class Monitoring

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.monitoring.Monitoring

  • public class Monitoring
extends Object
    Represents the monitoring (an information system, an attack graph and attack paths).
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy
